Module jGame
Package jGame.core.launcher

Class GameState

java.lang.Object
jGame.core.launcher.GameState
public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a game state to be played.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Nuno Pereira

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void initState()
    Initializes the current state, adding all entities and registering their respective listeners.
    void terminateState()
    Terminates the current state, removing all entities and unregistering their listeners.

    • GameState

      public GameState​(java.util.List<Entity> entities, java.util.List<UIHudElement> hudElements, java.lang.String gameStateName)
      Create a new GameState object with the given entities and HUD elements.
      Parameters:
      entities - the entities to be rendered in this game state
      hudElements - the HUD elements to appear on screen
      gameStateName - the name of this game state
      Since:
      1.0.0
